# f5xc_bgp_asn_set (Resource)

Manages a BgpAsnSet in F5 Distributed Cloud.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the BgpAsnSet.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the BgpAsnSet will be created.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the BgpAsnSet.
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels to apply to the BgpAsnSet.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the BgpAsnSet.
